content:
I have 

SEND_LOGIN_EMAILS = False

but I am still seeing that login emails are being sent, do I have to make a change somewhere else ?
Version 1.7.1
@Tim April Hmm. Did you run scripts/restart-server after editing your /etc/zulip/settings.py?
That's the only other thing you should have to do :)
thats seems to have done the trick
I didnt know about that script, i usually run supervisorctl restart all

For most folks, the supervisorctl thing works fine, but restart-server also handles the restarting the the Apache process for the REMOTE_USER_SSO backend (and some other cache-filling things that are less important).
